experience.title: Global Markets Intern
experience.description: • Contributed to the revenue and financial forecasting capabilities of the Comprehensive Capital Analysis and Review (CCAR) Team of JPMC• Explored various ML models using python to identify Geometric Brownian Motion as an approach to forecast macroeconomic variables• Reduced RMSE by 71% on optimising the randomness of the model using different path selection approaches based on insample results• Applied qualitative & statistical techniques to analyse revenues of different businesses for stress testing across different scenarios of company
experience.description_html: • Contributed to the revenue and financial forecasting capabilities of the Comprehensive Capital Analysis and Review (CCAR) Team of JPMC• Explored various ML models using python to identify Geometric Brownian Motion as an approach to forecast macroeconomic variables• Reduced RMSE by 71% on optimising the randomness of the model using different path selection approaches based on insample results• Applied qualitative & statistical techniques to analyse revenues of different businesses for stress testing across different scenarios of company

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: • Analyzed and wrangled data at district level to understand current food situation and its availability for underprivileged households of India• Structured the data containing 4L+ rows using preprocessing techniques like imputation & implemented feature engineering on multiple columns• Applied python wrapper, tabula-Py, to read PDFs into a list of data frames to execute the Extract Transform & Load (ETL) data modelling• Created a common template to convert unstructured data of PDF format, into a structured tabular format to automate the entire process
experience.description_html: • Analyzed and wrangled data at district level to understand current food situation and its availability for underprivileged households of India• Structured the data containing 4L+ rows using preprocessing techniques like imputation & implemented feature engineering on multiple columns• Applied python wrapper, tabula-Py, to read PDFs into a list of data frames to execute the Extract Transform & Load (ETL) data modelling• Created a common template to convert unstructured data of PDF format, into a structured tabular format to automate the entire process
experience.company: Bharti Institute of Public Policy, ISB

experience.title: Governor
experience.description: Drama is theatre ,an escape from life, happiness ,and sadness all rolled into one .  Pravah believes drama is fun-enjoying the moments on stage and giving our audience a worthwhile experience . Being an active member ,i have represented IIT Kharagpur in Streetplay 2019(Spring Fest ,IIT KGP)Apart from this ,I have also been a part of two other productions,which include 1 stage play ,1 street play . I have also played an integral role in directing and scripting a short film.

experience.title: Sponsorship Head
experience.description: • Acquired entire funding for India's largest Agriculture & Food Innovation fest Prakriti' 22 with participation of 400+ students from 25+ colleges• Communicated with the leading companies of Agriculture and Food sector & successfully raised an sponsorship worth INR 2.5L for the Prakriti

experience.title: Software Development Intern
experience.description: • Ideated and documented user events along with value pairs that can be pushed to the consumer retail website of the organisation using Postman• Integrated CleverTap in the website, to help analyse customer behaviour, thereby increasing user interaction and lifetime value in each order• Analyzed customer behavioural trends and improvised the recommendation system, which lead to an increase in sales of the client by 11%
